message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.SD

This paper presents a method for improving the efficiency of margin-based machine learning algorithms by determining when to stop the evaluation process. This topic is closely related to the fields of machine learning, artificial intelligence, computer vision, and neural networks, which are all covered by the arXiv CS sub-categories of cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, and cs.NE. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of sequential tests and early stopping inequalities, which are topics that fall under the sub-category of cs.SD (Systems and Control). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, and cs.SD, ordered from most to least likely.
